memberdef.name: LV_LMETER_LINE_UPSCALE
memberdef.initializer: 5 /*2^x upscale of line to make rounding*/

detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the line meters
lmeter
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the line meter
lmeter
pointer to a line meter object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Round a coordinate which is upscaled (>=x.5 -> x + 1; <x.5 -> x)
x
a coordinate which is greater then it should be
the downscaled and rounded coordinate (+-1)

Create a line meter objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new line meter
copy
pointer to a line meter object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created line meter

Set a new value on the line meter
lmeter
pointer to a line meter object
value
new value

Set minimum and the maximum values of a line meter
lmeter
pointer to he line meter object
min
minimum value
max
maximum value

Set the scale settings of a line meter
lmeter
pointer to a line meter object
angle
angle of the scale (0..360)
line_cnt
number of lines

Get the value of a line meter
lmeter
pointer to a line meter object
the value of the line meter

Get the minimum value of a line meter
lmeter
pointer to a line meter object
the minimum value of the line meter

Get the maximum value of a line meter
lmeter
pointer to a line meter object
the maximum value of the line meter

Get the scale number of a line meter
lmeter
pointer to a line meter object
number of the scale units

Get the scale angle of a line meter
lmeter
pointer to a line meter object
angle of the scale
